bs-tagcloud-error-tagtype: Given value "$1" is not a valid store.
bs-tagcloud-error-tagrenderer: Given value "$1" is not a valid renderer.
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-desc: Renders a tag cloud based on categories or search terms
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-renderer-h: Select how the tag cloud should be rendered
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-width-help: Width of the tag cloud in percent
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-showcount-: Display the number of items in parentheses
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-minsize-he: Font size for the entry with the fewest items
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-maxsize-he: Font size for the entry with the most items
bs-tagcloud-tag-tagcloud-attr-exclude-he: Do not show these pages in the tag cloud. For more pages, use a comma separated list, e.g. "Main Page, Test, MyPage"
